data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yoshizawa, Satoshi, Tachi, Takuji, Praxaysonbath, Bounthob, Suzuki, Dai (2015): A new species of the genus Pygophora Schiner from Laos (Diptera: Muscidae). Zootaxa 3920 (4): 586-592, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3920.4.8
